meta.name: generator
meta.content: HTML Tidy for FreeBSD (vers 25 March 2009), see www.w3.org

div.p: Sam Williams is an American journalist. He is perhaps best known as the author of a biography of software programmer Richard Stallman, Free as in Freedom: Richard Stallman's Crusade for Free Software (2002).
